org.magicdgs.readtools.tools.trimming

Class TrimAndFilterPipeline

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.broadinstitute.hellbender.engine.filters.ReadFilter
      • org.magicdgs.readtools.tools.trimming.TrimAndFilterPipeline
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.util.function.Predicate<org.broadinstitute.hellbender.utils.read.GATKRead>

    public class TrimAndFilterPipeline
extends org.broadinstitute.hellbender.engine.filters.ReadFilter
    Implements a pipeline for trimming in place (through TrimmingFunction) and filter (through ReadFilter) a GATKRead, collecting at the same time statistics for the pipeline into metrics. The pipeline is as following for test(GATKRead): - Each of the trimmers is applied in order. - After all trimmers are applied, ApplyTrimResultReadTransfomer updates the read. - A first filter is applied to check if the read is completely trimmed. - A composed AND filter with the provided ones is applied and returned the value. - If a filter is applied to the read, the SAMTag.FT is updated to reflect it.
    See Also:

      • fromPluginDescriptors

        public static TrimAndFilterPipeline fromPluginDescriptors(TrimmerPluginDescriptor trimmingPlugin,
                                                          org.broadinstitute.hellbender.cmdline.GATKPlugin.GATKReadFilterPluginDescriptor filterPlugin)
        Gets a trimming/filtering pipeline from the plugin descriptors. The list of trimmers/filters to apply is constructed first with the default ones and then with the user provided, in order.
        Parameters:
        trimmingPlugin - plugin to get the trimmer(s) from.
        filterPlugin - plugin to get the read filter(s) from.
        Returns:
        a trimming/filtering pipeline.
        Throws:
        CommandLineException.BadArgumentValue - if no trimmer and filter instances are specified.
